item.title: Text-Infused Attention and Foreground-Aware Modeling for Zero-Shot Temporal Action Detection
item.description: Ti-FAD: a novel zero-shot temporal action detection model outperforms state-of-the-art methods by enhancing text-related visual focus and foreground awareness.
